评论详情: I love these pants. They look really cute and nice for yoga pants. The material is decently thick and I don’t have panty line issues.  These pants are also crazy comfy! So much so, I have these in black and the brown color, plus the fleece lined version and plan to buy more in other colors.  I love the design of the pockets and the flare is perfect in my opinion. They work great with an oversized sweater for wearing at the office (my office is the casual end of business casual, most people wear jeans and sweatshirts) or going to dinner.  Plus, as a short-legged petite adult female, being able to order a girl’s size and not have to pay for tailoring is AMAZING!!!

评论概述: Size XL fits women’s size small/medium yoga pants. Nice thick fabric smooths cellulite. Pockets
评论详情: I have these Baleaf girls flate crossover yoga leggings in the grey, size XL. I typically wear a womens size medium yoga pant and have several to compare these to. These fit like my women’s size  Medium, or maybe a skosh smaller. I weigh #125 and am 5’2” and typically wear size 4-6 / Small regular pant (not Yoga). The fabric these are made of is soft, thick and smoothing. No sheerness at all. The flare is nice on these pant legs, not too big or small. The hems of these hit the floor on 5’2” me which I expected with the measurements given for these, inseam 29.3” But a pair of tennis shoes lifts the hems off the ground. I Love the useful pockets at each outer thigh. Nice pants.
These are very pretty and really nicely made.  They do fit as expected and look great on.
